definition: Yima county level city in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Yima county level city in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan

sentences.english: The bulk of the railroad workers voted to go back to work.
sentences.chinese: 大多數鐵路工人投票義馬市竊聽器同意規復事變。

sentences.english: The research results have been applied in coal mines of Yima Coal group Co. Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 研究成果在義馬耿村煤礦進行了推廣應用。

sentences.english: For a while, Li Qin, Li Yi, Ma Wen and Yang Xin get along very well with each other.
sentences.chinese: 一度，李芹李義馬文楊欣四個人，是一桌很好的麻將。

sentences.english: Coal spontaneous combustion is one of disaster in Yima coalfield.
sentences.chinese: 煤炭自燃是義馬煤田主要災害之一。
